# Preface {.unnumbered}

This lab manual has beenwritten to serve as your companion in learning and mastering the time series analysis, spatial analysis and Spatio-temporal analysis with Python.

This book is written based on Quarto using the RStudio IDE. The content is reproducible. To reproduce the work use the following steps

1.  Install R and RStudio

2.  Install Python

3.  Install jupyter using commander

    ```{py -m pip install jupyter`}
    ```
